sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0302 ( DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , PAYR_SEIL_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , PAY_PYMT_DDUC_PRCS_FLAG , PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT ,PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #pymtYrMnth# , #payCd# , #payrSeilNum# , #systemkey# , #payItemCd# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM),0) + 1 FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# ) , #pymtDducDivCd# , #pymtDducFreeDtySum# , #pymtDducSum# , #payPymtDducPrcsFlag# , #payReattyAdmntVal# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #pymtDducTxtnAmnt# , nvl(#pymtDducChgYn#,'N') )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0302 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# , PAY_CD=#payCd# , PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payItemSeilNum# , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD=#pymtDducDivCd# , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM=#pymtDducFreeDtySum# , PYMT_DDUC_SUM=#pymtDducSum# , PAY_PYMT_DDUC_PRCS_FLAG=#payPymtDducPrcsFlag# , PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL=#payReattyAdmntVal# , PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN=NVL(#pymtDducChgYn#,'N') , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT=#pymtDducTxtnAmnt# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# AND PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payItemSeilNum#

UPDATE PAYR0302 SET PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM=#pymtDducFreeDtySum# , PYMT_DDUC_SUM=#pymtDducSum# , PAY_PYMT_DDUC_PRCS_FLAG=#payPymtDducPrcsFlag# , PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN = NVL(#pymtDducChgYn#,'N') , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT=#pymtDducTxtnAmnt# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# AND PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL=#payReattyAdmntVal#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#
PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payItemSeilNum#
DELETE FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#

DELETE FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#
PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payItemSeilNum#
PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL=#payReattyAdmntVal#

DELETE FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , PAYR_SEIL_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , PAY_PYMT_DDUC_PRCS_FLAG , PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# AND PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payItemSeilNum#

SELECT DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , PAYR_SEIL_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , PAY_PYMT_DDUC_PRCS_FLAG , PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# AND PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL=#payReattyAdmntVal#

SELECT DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , PAYR_SEIL_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , PAY_PYMT_DDUC_PRCS_FLAG , PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD = #pymtDducDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY= (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#,'-',''))) AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , PAYR_SEIL_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , PAY_PYMT_DDUC_PRCS_FLAG , PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM PAYR0302 WHERE 1=1
PYMT_YR_MNTH = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , PAY_ITEM_CD DESC , PAY_CD DESC , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD DESC , PAYR_SEIL_NUM DESC , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0302 WHERE 1=1
PYMT_YR_MNTH = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT FF.DPOB_CD, FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH, FF.PAY_CD, FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM, FF.SYSTEMKEY, FF.PAY_ITEM_CD, FF. PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN, FF.PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM, FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD, FF.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM, FF.PYMT_DDUC_SUM, FF.PAY_PYMT_DDUC_PRCS_FLAG, FF.PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL, FF.PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT, FF.PYYT_YRTX_DOTN_CD, FF.PYYT_YTFE_DTY_REDU_CD, HH.MNTH_PAY_ADMNT_YN, NVL(HH.PYMT_DDUC_SUM,0) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM02, NVL(HH.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM,0) AS PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM02, NVL(HH.PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT,0) AS PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT02 FROM PAYR0302 FF, PAYR0300 GG, PAYR0307 HH WHERE FF.DPOB_CD = GG.DPOB_CD AND FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = GG.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND FF.PAY_CD = GG.PAY_CD AND FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = GG.PAYR_SEIL_NUM AND FF.DPOB_CD = HH.DPOB_CD(+) AND FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = HH.PYMT_YR_MNTH(+) AND FF.PAY_CD = HH.PAY_CD(+) AND FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = HH.PAYR_SEIL_NUM(+) AND FF.SYSTEMKEY = HH.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND FF.PAY_ITEM_CD = HH.PAY_ITEM_CD(+) AND FF.PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL = HH.MNTH_PAY_ADMNT_SEIL_NUM(+)
FF.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
FF.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
FF.PAY_CD=#payCd#
FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = #pymtYrMnth#
FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#
FF.PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#
AND FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080010', 'B0080020' ) ORDER BY FF.DPOB_CD, FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH, FF.PAY_CD, FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM, FF.SYSTEMKEY, FF.PAY_ITEM_CD, FF.PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM

SELECT FF.DPOB_CD, FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH, FF.PAY_CD, FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM, FF.SYSTEMKEY, FF.PAY_ITEM_CD, FF.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN, FF.PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM, FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD, FF.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM, FF.PYMT_DDUC_SUM, FF.PAY_PYMT_DDUC_PRCS_FLAG, FF.PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL, FF.PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT, FF.PYYT_YRTX_DOTN_CD, FF.PYYT_YTFE_DTY_REDU_CD, HH.MNTH_PAY_ADMNT_YN, NVL(HH.PYMT_DDUC_SUM,0) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM02, NVL(HH.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM,0) AS PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM02, NVL(HH.PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT,0) AS PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT02 FROM PAYR0302 FF, PAYR0300 GG, PAYR0307 HH WHERE FF.DPOB_CD = GG.DPOB_CD AND FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = GG.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND FF.PAY_CD = GG.PAY_CD AND FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = GG.PAYR_SEIL_NUM AND FF.DPOB_CD = HH.DPOB_CD(+) AND FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = HH.PYMT_YR_MNTH(+) AND FF.PAY_CD = HH.PAY_CD(+) AND FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = HH.PAYR_SEIL_NUM(+) AND FF.SYSTEMKEY = HH.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND FF.PAY_ITEM_CD = HH.PAY_ITEM_CD(+) AND FF.PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL = HH.MNTH_PAY_ADMNT_SEIL_NUM(+)
FF.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
FF.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
FF.PAY_CD=#payCd#
FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = #pymtYrMnth#
FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#
FF.PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#
AND FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080030', 'B0080040' ) ORDER BY FF.DPOB_CD, FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH, FF.PAY_CD, FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM, FF.SYSTEMKEY, FF.PAY_ITEM_CD, FF.PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , AA.PAY_ITEM_CD , (SELECT PAY_EXTPY_NM FROM PAYR0480 WHERE PAYR0480.DPOB_CD= #dpobCd# AND PAYR0480.PAY_EXTPY_CD= AA.PAY_ITEM_CD) AS PAY_ITEM_NM , AA.PAY_CD , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , AA.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_SUM , AA. PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , AA.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM (SELECT FF.DPOB_CD , FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH , FF.SYSTEMKEY , FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , FF.PAY_ITEM_CD , FF.PAY_CD , GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM) AS PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_SUM) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT) AS PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , MAX(CASE WHEN PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL = '0' THEN FF.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN ELSE FF.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN END) AS PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM PAYR0302 FF, PAYR0300 GG WHERE FF.DPOB_CD = GG.DPOB_CD AND FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = GG.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND FF.PAY_CD = GG.PAY_CD AND FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = GG.PAYR_SEIL_NUM
FF.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
FF.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
FF.PAY_CD=#payCd#
FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = #pymtYrMnth#
FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#
AND FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080010', 'B0080020' ) GROUP BY FF.DPOB_CD , FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH , FF.SYSTEMKEY , FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , FF.PAY_ITEM_CD , FF.PAY_CD , GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM ) AA
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.PAY_ITEM_CD , (SELECT PAY_EXTPY_NM FROM PAYR0480 WHERE PAYR0480.DPOB_CD= #dpobCd# AND PAYR0480.PAY_EXTPY_CD= AA.PAY_ITEM_CD) AS PAY_ITEM_NM , AA.PAY_CD , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , AA.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_SUM , AA. PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , AA.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM (SELECT FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH , FF.SYSTEMKEY , FF.PAY_ITEM_CD , FF.PAY_CD , GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM) AS PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_SUM) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT) AS PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , MAX(CASE WHEN PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL = '0' THEN FF.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN ELSE FF.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN END) AS PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM PAYR0302 FF, PAYR0300 GG WHERE FF.DPOB_CD = GG.DPOB_CD AND FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = GG.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND FF.PAY_CD = GG.PAY_CD AND FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = GG.PAYR_SEIL_NUM
FF.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
FF.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
FF.PAY_CD=#payCd#
FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = #pymtYrMnth#
FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#
AND FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080010', 'B0080020' )
GROUP BY FF.DPOB_CD ,FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH , FF.SYSTEMKEY , FF.PAY_ITEM_CD , FF.PAY_CD , GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM ) AA )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.PAY_ITEM_CD , (SELECT PAY_DDUC_NM FROM PAYR0470 WHERE PAYR0470.DPOB_CD= #dpobCd# AND PAYR0470.PAY_DDUC_CD= AA.PAY_ITEM_CD) AS PAY_ITEM_NM , AA.PAY_CD , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , AA.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_SUM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , AA.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_NM , AA. PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , AA.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM (SELECT FF.DPOB_CD , FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH , FF.SYSTEMKEY , FF.PAY_ITEM_CD , FF.PAY_CD , GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM) AS PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_SUM) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT) AS PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(FF.DPOB_CD,FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD) AS PYMT_DDUC_DIV_NM , MAX(CASE WHEN PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL = '0' THEN FF.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN ELSE FF.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN END) AS PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM PAYR0302 FF, PAYR0300 GG WHERE FF.DPOB_CD = GG.DPOB_CD AND FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = GG.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND FF.PAY_CD = GG.PAY_CD AND FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = GG.PAYR_SEIL_NUM
FF.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
FF.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
FF.PAY_CD=#payCd#
FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = #pymtYrMnth#
FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#
AND FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080030', 'B0080040' )
GROUP BY FF.DPOB_CD , FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH , FF.PAY_ITEM_CD , FF.PAY_CD , GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , FF.SYSTEMKEY ) AA
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.PAY_ITEM_CD , (SELECT PAY_DDUC_NM FROM PAYR0470 WHERE PAYR0470.DPOB_CD= #dpobCd# AND PAYR0470.PAY_DDUC_CD= AA.PAY_ITEM_CD) AS PAY_ITEM_NM , AA.PAY_CD , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , AA.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_SUM , AA. PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , AA.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM (SELECT FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH , FF.SYSTEMKEY , FF.PAY_ITEM_CD , FF.PAY_CD , GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM) AS PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_SUM) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM , SUM(FF.PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT) AS PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , MAX(CASE WHEN PAY_REATTY_ADMNT_VAL = '0' THEN FF.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN ELSE FF.PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN END) AS PYMT_DDUC_CHG_YN FROM PAYR0302 FF, PAYR0300 GG WHERE FF.DPOB_CD = GG.DPOB_CD AND FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = GG.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND FF.PAY_CD = GG.PAY_CD AND FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = GG.PAYR_SEIL_NUM
FF.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
FF.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
FF.PAY_CD=#payCd#
FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH = #pymtYrMnth#
FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#
AND FF.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080030', 'B0080040' )
GROUP BY FF.DPOB_CD , FF.PYMT_YR_MNTH , FF.PAY_ITEM_CD , FF.PAY_CD , GG.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , FF.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , FF.SYSTEMKEY ) AA )

SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH, AA.PAY_CD, AA.PAYR_SEIL_NUM, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.SUM_B001, AA.TP_PYMT_TOT_AMNT, AA.TP_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT, AA.TP_TXTN_TOT_AMNT, AA.TP_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT, AA.TP_DDUC_TOT_AMNT , BB.SPUE_YN, BB.SUPRT_FAMY_NUM_TWEN_CH_DN, BB.SUPRT_FAMY_NUM_TRE_OVR_CHDN, BB.SUPRT_FAMY_NUM_ETC , AA.SUM_B002, NVL(FF.DILNLAZ_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS,0) AS DILNLAZ_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH, PAY_CD, PAYR_SEIL_NUM, SYSTEMKEY, SUM(CASE WHEN PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080010' ) THEN PYMT_DDUC_SUM ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_B001, SUM(CASE WHEN PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080010', 'B0080020' ) THEN PYMT_DDUC_SUM ELSE 0 END) AS TP_PYMT_TOT_AMNT, SUM(CASE WHEN PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080020') THEN PYMT_DDUC_SUM ELSE 0 END) AS TP_EXTPY_TOT_AMNT, SUM(CASE WHEN PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080010', 'B0080020' ) THEN PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT ELSE 0 END) AS TP_TXTN_TOT_AMNT, SUM(CASE WHEN PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080020' ) THEN PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM ELSE 0 END) AS TP_FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT, SUM(CASE WHEN PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080030') THEN PYMT_DDUC_SUM ELSE 0 END) AS TP_DDUC_TOT_AMNT , SUM(CASE WHEN PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080030') AND PAY_ITEM_CD IN ('D0150100','D0150200','D0150300') THEN PYMT_DDUC_SUM ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_B002 FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# GROUP BY DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH, PAY_CD, PAYR_SEIL_NUM, SYSTEMKEY) AA , PAYR0304 BB, DLGN0100 FF WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND AA.PAY_CD = BB.PAY_CD AND AA.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = BB.PAYR_SEIL_NUM AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = FF.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY= FF.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH = FF.DILNLAZ_YR_MNTH AND AA.PAY_CD = FF.PAY_CD
